subject: Software Architecture Assignment
passwordHelper: Password must be at least 12 characters long, include one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
historyNoDataParraf: Play a game to have history.
loginToAddUser: Don't have an account? Sign up here
logoutMessage: Thank you for playing. Come back soon!
welcomeMessage: Welcome to our exciting online trivia game, where you can test your knowledge and challenge your friends in an intellectual duel
welcomeMessage3: Multiplayer Mode: Challenge your friends in exciting real-time multiplayer matches.
welcomeMessage4: Daily Challenges: Keep your mind sharp with our daily challenges!
customModeNumPreguntas: Select the number of questions you want in the game
customModeNumTiempo: Select the time you want in the game.
roomGameWaitPlayersEnd: Waiting for other players to finish the game
basicGameEnd: Game over, your results are as follows:
createRoomInfo: By clicking 'Create Room', a new room with a unique ID will be created. You'll need to share this ID with the people you want to join your room.
diaryGameText: You have already played today's daily challenge, come back tomorrow to play again.
helpCustom: Create your own challenge! In this mode, you can customize the time to answer the questions and the number of questions you want to answer.
helpCategory: Show your mastery in a specific topic. In this mode, all questions will be related to a selected category.
helpDaily: Keep your mind sharp! Each day, you will find a new challenge with fresh questions.
helpSage: Test your knowledge without a time limit.
helpBasic: Show your ability to answer questions in a limited time.
